subject: Olympic Games
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Kelly Clark became the first snowboarder to snare a spot on the 2010 United States halfpipe team by winning the United States Snowboarding Grand Prix at Mammoth Mountain, Calif.
snippet: Kelly Clark became the first snowboarder to snare a spot on the 2010 United States halfpipe team by winning the United States Snowboarding Grand Prix at Mammoth Mountain, Calif.
